complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Deno Project with TypeScript Foundation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Deno project initialization into specific configuration steps: directory structure creation, deno.json configuration, environment setup, VS Code configuration, module installation, and basic testing setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple configuration files and environment setup. Well-defined scope with clear deliverables makes it suitable for 6 focused subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the OpenAPI documentation generation into: specification creation, schema definitions, endpoint documentation, authentication documentation, example generation, Swagger UI setup, SDK configuration, and automated update mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive documentation requirements, multiple output formats, and integration with existing endpoints. Requires detailed technical writing and tooling setup.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the async pipeline into: queue system design, stage definition and implementation, worker process creation, error handling and retry logic, status tracking, dead letter queue setup, monitoring integration, performance optimization, and end-to-end testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving distributed systems concepts, error handling, monitoring, and multiple integration points. Critical system component requiring robust architecture.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide batch upload implementation into: multipart request handling, batch validation logic, queue integration, batch tracking system, status aggregation, partial failure handling, performance optimization, and comprehensive testing scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to handling multiple files, complex error scenarios, and integration with existing pipeline. Requires careful design for scalability and error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down rate limiting into: sliding window algorithm implementation, Redis integration, middleware creation, HTTP header handling, abuse detection logic, premium bypass functionality, and monitoring/alerting setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity involving algorithms, Redis operations, and middleware integration. Requires careful consideration of performance and accuracy.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide S3 integration into: client configuration, encryption setup, signed URL generation, lifecycle policy configuration, file validation implementation, naming convention setup, and error handling with retry logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving cloud service integration, security considerations, and multiple configuration aspects. Well-defined scope with clear technical requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down OCR integration into: API client setup, document format handling, Russian language configuration, field extraction logic, confidence scoring implementation, error handling and retry mechanisms, and fallback system creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to external API integration, multi-language support, and complex data extraction requirements. Requires robust error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide performance optimization into: database query optimization, connection pooling setup, caching strategy implementation, file streaming optimization, load testing framework setup, auto-scaling configuration, monitoring integration, memory optimization, and CDN setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving multiple system components, performance analysis, and load testing. Requires deep technical knowledge and comprehensive testing approach.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down security hardening into: security headers implementation, input validation and sanitization, SQL injection prevention, TLS configuration, malware scanning setup, CORS policy implementation, audit logging, intrusion detection, and API key security measures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive security requirements across multiple attack vectors. Critical for production readiness and requires expertise in security best practices.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide monitoring setup into: health check endpoint creation, metrics collection implementation, structured logging setup, dashboard creation, alerting configuration, uptime monitoring, SLA tracking, and log aggregation system setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity involving multiple monitoring tools and integration points. Essential for production operations and requires comprehensive coverage of system components.
